_sText:
Run as fast as you can avoid traps and zombies there are 4 traps

BREAKABLE FLOOR
This one is impossible to notice however walk trough the
middleof all the floors or shoot the floor

ROTATING FANS
walk over the small solid part of the fan 

THE ROOM
be the first to cross the room otherwise you will be trapped

BREAKABLE GLASS
Shoot all the glass and follow the path
or look at the arrows on the roof

4 DOORS 4 SURVIVORS
Run quickly trough the door to reach the fort
then don't forget to close the doors and defend ;)

TEXTURES ARE INTEGRATED IN THE BSP (reason of size)

important! set your brightness at least at 1.8 it will give the best results.
